name: CastClick Network
tag_list: advertising, publisher, advertiser, ad-space, sell, buy, network, ads, marketing, monetize
overview:
About CastClick Network (VibeCast Network Sdn. Bhd.)

CastClick.com has been created with the mindset of creating simplicity from complexity in the world of online advertising.

CastClick spotted the need of website owners to sell their ad space directly to advertisers, overcoming the disadvantages of automated systems, like Google’s AdSense and many other networks, where neither the advertiser nor the publisher has any control of the advertisements’ quality, pricing and ad position. We offers website owners with the ability to sell their ad space, automatically, to the advertisers, on a price-per-click/view basis, where the price is mostly effected by the quality and popularity of their website.
